seo.title: Method – Louhen
seo.description: How Louhen works: fit-first guidance, trusted sizing, and effortless discovery.

hero.title: Fit intelligence that keeps up with growing feet.
hero.subtitle_generic: We pair quick scans with podiatrist-reviewed data so every recommendation feels personal, safe, and ready for play.
hero.subtitle_personalized: We pair quick scans with podiatrist-reviewed data so every recommendation feels personal to {name}.
hero.trustLine: Trusted by podiatrists and loved by families.
hero.imageAlt: Illustration of a parent guiding a child through a Louhen foot scan

items.title: Kid-safe scanning
items.body: Capture a 3D foot profile with any phone in under a minute. No raw images ever leave your device.

items.title: LouhenFit engine
items.body: Measurements translate into the inside of real shoes so length, width, and wiggle room align before you order.

items.title: Adaptive personalization
items.body: Profiles learn from wear feedback, surfacing styles that match growth patterns and preferences.

items.title: LouhenFit guarantee
items.body: If the first pair doesn’t feel right, LouhenFit covers the return and tunes the next recommendation with you.
items.badgeTooltip: Free returns and a guided re-check whenever the fit feels off.

scienceDisclosure.title: See the science
scienceDisclosure.body: Every scan becomes a map of interior shoe space, matching length, width, and instep room before the box ships. Wear check-ins from families feed the engine, so each suggestion gets smarter.
scienceDisclosure.privacyNote: We only sync scans after you say so. <privacyLink>Read how we protect families in our privacy policy</privacyLink>.

how.title: How it works
how.xpTeaser: Earn XP for your first scan and unlock fit tips sooner.

steps.title: Start with a scan or size
steps.body: Create a child profile with measurements or customise it for {name}.

steps.title: Louhen builds the fit profile
steps.body: We analyze growth history, support needs, and activity goals.

steps.title: Recommendations stay relevant
steps.body: Only shoes that match their fit confidence, style, and season appear.

steps.title: You review, they explore
steps.body: Order with clarity and simple wear checks to confirm comfort at home.

steps.title: Keep the journey going
steps.body: Join the waitlist to unlock invites, tips, and surprise drops.

trust.headline: Podiatry advisors keep LouhenFit aligned with healthy development for every stage.
trust.body: Each recommendation includes fit confidence, break-in guidance, and when to re-check their size.
trust.quote: “We never guess sizes anymore. Louhen explains why a shoe fits so I can say yes with confidence.”

testimonial.quote: “Louhen shows the data so I don’t second-guess the size anymore.”
testimonial.attribution: Jon, dad of a fearless runner

founder.title: From our family to yours
founder.body: Louhen began when our twins needed their first shoes. We wanted every parent to feel confident before hitting checkout.
